86245.「私は 古今東西の 珍しいものを\n 取り扱っている 謎の行商人\n ピヨピヨさ:
I am Mr. Piyo-Piyo, a puzzling peddler of curios: old, new, and from all over the world.
Young folks, eh... I have nothing to sell you now.

86239.「私は 古今東西の 珍しいものを\n 取り扱っている 謎の行商人\n ピヨピヨさ:
I am Mr. Piyo-Piyo, a puzzling peddler of curios: old, new, and from all over the world.
Hoho... You want a chickpea? You have an eye for the finer things. Chickpeas cost 1,414 Gold a piece. How about it, would you like to buy some?

86240.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「若者よ……。\n:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Young one... Chickpeas have unlimited possibilities.
I wanted you to understand that.

86241.「若者よ……。\n キミのおこづかいでは 買えないようだ。\n １４１４ゴールド:
Young one... Pocket change won't buy it. Save up
1,414 Gold and come back.

86242.「若者よ……。\n この豆には １粒に １４１４万チキンパワーが\n 宿っている:
Young one... 1 pod is said to have the power of
14,140,000 chickens contained within it. Go ahead,
take it.

86243.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「その豆には 値:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Those peas' worth can't be measured by their price...
You've made an excellent purchase.

86457.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「若者よ……。\:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Young one... I've sold out this years stock of chickpeas.
Raise your chicks well.
